component.js

A Tiny Modular Javascript Framework

Small Footprint

Component.js is 1 - 6kb in file size on it's own. Since this framework is modular if you add the router and have es5 support then the file size is only 9kb!

Natural

This framework is designed similar to Vuejs so if you've used Vuejs you will be familar with this.
It focuses on SOC (separation of concern), HTML templates are in HTML, JS is within a JS file and Sass is used for css.

Modular

The concept of this framwork is to keep this minimal and it plays well with others. You can bolt on other libraries to add more features

Fast

Using the create task you can instantly generate a component. All the files are created with the base for each of them already created for you.

SEO Friendly

Most frameworks render the conent on runtime but componet.js works with rendered HTML so it's better for SEO!

About component.js

This is a mini framework to build in a modular way by allowing you to build components just like in frameworks such as Vuejs, angular js and react.

Why choose this framework?

This is not like other frameworks, you can bolt this framework on to existing projects and is designed to be a small footprint for projects with limited file sizes or projects which want to small I size as possible.

The concept was created when there was a project that had a 150kb file size and there was a need for a component based architecture. This allows you to take control over what you feel is necessary for the project as component.js only provides the bare minimum needed for building modular.

There is a router and boilerplate which adds the basics for a full featured development process. Using this you can rapidly build projects.
